author: Charles Moore
title: Margaret Thatcher biography part 1: Changing the world in one week
text: Margaret Thatcher biography Margaret Thatcher biography part 1: Changing the world in one week In this, the second volume of Charles Moore’s authorised biography of Margaret Thatcher, the country’s first and - so far - only woman prime minister is at the height of her powers British Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher stands in front of a hangar door at a hovercraft plant on the Isle of Wight, 1983 Photo: Peter Jordan/The LIFE Images Collection/Getty Images
